attributes.action: Box Playing Fields and the Parish Council
attributes.additional_details:
We would like to see a long term approach and planning for our play grounds/fields with funding options as well as community consultation, involvement, and transparency in the process.

We disapprove of the current haphazard way and lack of communication, consultation and transparency from our Parish Council on all matters.

rejection.details: If you can resubmit with a slightly clearer proposal, it is probably for the Department for Communities and Local Government.
